CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 18, 1960, pg .5 reads: "2. The stage was set with the very latest gas appliances (from range to washer), furnished by the Natural Gas Companies."
TitMainTitle: Crowd watching demonstration on stage of Natural Gas Companies booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1960 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama
